title: Treasury Yields Fall After Russia Attacks Ukraine
sub_head: Investors take measure of how conflict might affect economic growth
body:
U.S. government bond yields fell Thursday as investors sought out haven assets following the Russian attack on Ukraine.
The yield on the benchmark 10-year Treasury note finished Thursdayâ€™s session at 1.969%, according to Tradeweb, down from 1.976% Wednesday.
